name: Fr!end2Rent
description:
Content Warning: You might find mild swearing, violence, the presence of blood, drugs, and a lot of humor and irony.

Invited to a Halloween party, you deliberately lied to your best friend and invented a romantic relationship. The problem? You have to go and people are waiting for you to be... accompanied. And there is NO WAY you'll face them alone!

Characters: Features:

Choose your new friend wisely because tonight will surely be exciting!

- Several ways to learn how to wreck a party and destroy your social skills.

- Multiple choices with 11 endings.

- Character customization. 

- 5 "Friends to Rent" and more to come...
